protocol.text: plants grown on soil under short day conditions (8h light 23°C and 16h dark 22°C)
1µM Flg22 infiltrated in leaves, harvested 4h pi

RNAs have been treated with the One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit from Affymetrix (Santa Clara, CA) until dscDNA with T7 primer incorporation. Resulting “Target” dscDNA (double-stranded cDNA) has been purified  and served as a template in the subsequent in vitro trascription   (IVT) reaction for complimentary RNA (cRNA) amplification and biotin labeling. We used the GeneChip IVT labeling Kit from Affymetrix.
total RNA was extracted from plant tissue using the TRIZOL Method and afterwards RNA cleanup with RNeacsy Kit from Quiagen
H2O infiltrated in leaves, harvested 4h pi

RNAs have been treated with the One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit from Affymetrix (Santa Clara, CA) until dscDNA with T7 primer incorporation. Resulting “Target” dscDNA (double-stranded cDNA) has been purified  and served as a template in the subsequent in vitro trascription  (IVT) reaction for complimentary RNA (cRNA) amplification and biotin labeling. We used the GeneChip IVT labeling Kit from Affymetrix
